title: Small flaw in the honor system
body:
So i decided to play league late at night. I got into a blind pick game as master yi and completely destroyed the enemy team 23-3 with a 1V5 pentakill and 3 baron solos. I was carrying my team pretty hard, and couldn't wait to get those sweet honors after the game as my reward. 

Then it ended up with our Vayne getting 4 honors for sitting botlane and farming all game. She did nothing that game, other than farming bot. At the time i just couldn't believe i got 0 honors for my work and was kinda dissapointed. 

Then i started to wonder if i got a little extra honor progression for carrying my team, or Vayne got it all and i got nothing.
Because that's what i would call a small flaw in the system then. You can work you're butt off in game but you're teammates will honor someone random because they don't really care. Some people even skips honors.

I just want to know if you can get honor progression for carrying or you HAVE to get honored by your team.

replies.body: Thank you, just wanted to know :)
